This code system http://linuxforhealth.org/fhir/cdm/CodeSystem/diagnosis-type defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
external-cause External CauseICD diagnosis external cause code on the facility claim record

title: Diagnosis Type Codes
description: Standard codes for the diagnosis codes on a claim
